author: Esther Emma
content:
this certainly is one of your 'have to look twice' kinda thing
and i love it.
first i thought it were a kind of blackburned branches 
popping out of the fresh fallen snow
second i recognized the rack but in different dimensions, like it was on the street near the street walk (sort of drain)
the third look brought me where you wanted me to be, in front of this snowcovered hood with the popping out whipers. 
mystery revealed ;-)
beautiful natural black and white

have a lovely weekend, andreas
